name: Chaos Overload
description:
Made for Mini Jam 100: Overload.  Restriction Chaos.

This is based off of my project NecroMagic, but with a lot of changes.

You control a mage, and as you shoot fireballs at enemies the chaos rises.  Every 20 fireballs you will need to choose what the chaos does between 3 options.  They can be simple changes, like enemy health going up, or they can be changes to how you control your character.  Survive as long as you can.  The leaderboard may not be fully functional.
